alert.note: Alert for Osage (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 16 at 3:11AM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible...with a brief mix to start. Total snow accumulations near 4 inches possible in the far north and northwest part of Osage county. A light glaze of ice is possible at onset. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph, creating dangerous near blizzard conditions. * WHERE...Osage County. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on travel impacts. The potentially hazardous conditions could disrupt daily life, with threats to life possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Persons should consider delaying travel on Thursday. Motorists should use extreme caution if travel is absolutely necessary.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
